channel.title: Zenith 718
channel.description: Hey guys this is the first time posting here ^^ so please help me out. Im really new to 718 and now i want to add a shop at home of zenith which is in clan castle i think ^^ could you please help me out give me a code and tell me where to put it? thanks alot

item.title: Zenith 718
item.dc:creator: @Haydnz1234 Haydnz1234
item.description:
@Haydnz1234 wrote:

All you have to do is once you’ve edited unpackedShops file, delete packedShops.s file, compile and when you next run it re-creates the packedShops file

  • Job Done!

Read full topic

item.title: Zenith 718
item.dc:creator: @ford_rock99 ford rock99
item.description:
@ford_rock99 wrote:

Leech up, you also will have to use npchandler to make npcs open the shops.

if (npc.getId() == 8443) player.getDialogueManager().startDialogue("Lucien", npc.getId());

^^ npchandler.java

item.title: Zenith 718
item.dc:creator: @xplode xplode
item.description:
@xplode wrote:

npcSpawning.java to place npc… and unpackedshops.java to place items in shop… pretty basic stuff mann my b if its not as Detailed as hoped but im giving ya 2 main files to move npcs/add them and add items in shops/remove
